title: Naotaka Takeda
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Takeda was born in <a href="Shizuoka%20Prefecture">Shizuoka Prefecture</a> on July 13, 1978. After graduating from <a href="University%20of%20Tsukuba">University of Tsukuba</a>, he joined <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Albirex%20Niigata">Albirex Niigata</a> in 2001. On October 28, he debuted as right side-back against <a href="Sagan%20Tosu">Sagan Tosu</a>. However he could only play this match and he left the club end of 2001 season.
